sections.heading: Introduction
paragraphs: Probability distribution is a stream of mathematics which enables to assign a value to an entity between 0 and 1. 0 being least probable and 1 being the most.

sections.heading: IAM Permission Policies for IaC and Pulumi Login.
paragraphs: Pulumi respects the AWS credentials configured in the system. Create a AWS user with policy IAMFullAccess and PowerUserAccess. Configure the AWS credentials in the system, providing a profile is optional. I have configured a profile named writeonce-iac.
To manage the state of Pulumi you can create S3 bucket in AWS, I named it as writeonce-pulumi-state.Then login to pulumi by providing the S3 bucket url along with credentials profile.
